amuse.nodes.trainer.interfaces
Interface TrainerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
J48Adapter, KNNAdapter, LinearDiscriminantAnalysisAdapter, NaiveBayesAdapter, RandomForestAdapter, SVMAdapter
public interface TrainerInterface

This interface defines the operations which should be supported by all classification trainers.

Version:
